m_szDocTitle: UK Electric Car Sales Skyrocketing! | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: UK Electric Car Sales Skyrocketing! Originally published on EV Obsession . Electric vehicle (EV) registrations in the UK between January and May of 2015 are already roughly equal to total EV registrations in 2014, based on the most recent figures from the Society of Motor Manufacturers and Traders (SMMT). Apparently, there have already been 11,842 ultra-low-emission vehicles (ULEVs) registered in the UK this year (as of the end of May). This compares to 2,838 units registered during January–May 2014 — which means that more than 4 times the number of ULEVs have been registered this year as comp
